description:
Remove localizer object from TabView.xib.

This was used to localize the context menu, but the context menu is no longer in the xib file.

BUG=28977
TEST=tab's context menu still works, is still localized.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=35087

messages.text: No idea why codereview thinks I wanted to have this reviewed by thomaslewis…trungl, this is for you.

Are you sure this isn't still needed for a tooltip or something? I ran
into that situation on the toolbar xib.

On Mon, Dec 21, 2009 at 1:57 AM,  <viettrungluu@chromium.org> wrote:
> lgtm
>
> http://codereview.chromium.org/502090
>



-- 
Mike Pinkerton
Mac Weenie
pinkerton@google.com

Tooltips still seem to work.

On Tue, Dec 22, 2009 at 9:46 AM, Mike Pinkerton <pinkerton@chromium.org> wrote:
> Are you sure this isn't still needed for a tooltip or something? I ran
> into that situation on the toolbar xib.
>
> On Mon, Dec 21, 2009 at 1:57 AM,  <viettrungluu@chromium.org> wrote:
>> lgtm
>>
>> http://codereview.chromium.org/502090
>>
>
>
>
> --
> Mike Pinkerton
> Mac Weenie
> pinkerton@google.com
>

AFAICT, none of the items in TabView.xib have a "hard-coded" tooltip which would be handled automagically by the localizer.

On 2009/12/22 17:47:10, pink wrote:
> Are you sure this isn't still needed for a tooltip or something? I ran
> into that situation on the toolbar xib.
> 
> On Mon, Dec 21, 2009 at 1:57 AM,  <mailto:viettrungluu@chromium.org> wrote:
> > lgtm
> >
> > http://codereview.chromium.org/502090
> >
> 
> 
> 
> -- 
> Mike Pinkerton
> Mac Weenie
> mailto:pinkerton@google.com
>

If the IB inspector didn't show the imageview wired to anything, and the
localizer step didn't find any strings, then it sounds like it wasn't
needed.  Could check the history on the file to confirm when it got added
and what for to be safe.

TVL


On Tue, Dec 22, 2009 at 12:58 PM, <viettrungluu@chromium.org> wrote:

> AFAICT, none of the items in TabView.xib have a "hard-coded" tooltip which
> would
> be handled automagically by the localizer.
>
>
> On 2009/12/22 17:47:10, pink wrote:
>
>> Are you sure this isn't still needed for a tooltip or something? I ran
>> into that situation on the toolbar xib.
>>
>
>  On Mon, Dec 21, 2009 at 1:57 AM,  <mailto:viettrungluu@chromium.org>
>> wrote:
>> > lgtm
>> >
>> > http://codereview.chromium.org/502090
>> >
>>
>
>
>
>  --
>> Mike Pinkerton
>> Mac Weenie
>> mailto:pinkerton@google.com
>>
>
>
>
>
> http://codereview.chromium.org/502090
>

The image view came in with the first revision of TabView.xib, and the
localizer was added in a largish "add i18n to several xib files",
probably for the for the context menu, which was still in the xib back
then.

<thomasvl@chromium.org> wrote:

> localizer was added in a largish "add i18n to several xib files",
